scripts.postinstall:
node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const rpl = require('replacer'); const fspath = require('path'); global.process.chdir(__dirname); fs.readFile('dist/index.html', 'utf8', (_err, data) => { const replacedData = rpl(`href='\/`)(`href='./`)("""); const secondReplacement = rpl(`src='."`)(""); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.html', replacedData + '
' + secondReplacement(data), {'flag': 'w'}); });"
